channel.title: Python on Raku Programming
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Raku Programming

item.title: Python Vs Raku
item.description: Python Vs Raku, 比较哪个写法更优雅简洁。 zip() # OUTPUT What is your name? It is lancelot. What is your quest? It is the holy grail. What is your favorite color? It is blue. Python questions = ['name', 'quest', 'favorite color'] answers = ['lancelot', 'the holy grail', 'blue'] for q, a in zip(questions, answers): print 'What is your {0}? It is {1}.'.format(q, a) Raku my @questions = ('name', ' quest', 'favorite color'); my @answers = ("lancelot", "the holy grail", "blue"); for zip(@questions, @answers) -> ($question, $answer) { say "What is you $question?
